p: Then, in order to test whether chemical composition of sunflower oil is affected by pollination level, we performed two beta regression models, one for each of the main fatty acids of sunflower oil (oleic and linoleic), with hybrid type (‘High-oleic’ and ‘Linoleic’), pollination treatment (‘Pollinator-excluded’, ‘Open pollination’ and ‘Pollen supplemented’) and their interaction as explanatory variables.
